steps.data: <?php /* Use pretty permalinks*/ add_action( 'after_setup_theme', function() { global $wp_rewrite; $wp_rewrite->set_permalink_structure('/%postname%/'); $wp_rewrite->flush_rules(); } );

<?php
				add_action('init', function () {
					if (!class_exists('WP_Import')) {
						require_once ABSPATH . 'wp-admin/includes/import.php';
						require_once WP_PLUGIN_DIR . '/wordpress-importer/wordpress-importer.php';
					}

					$file_url = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/your-repo/path/to/file.xml';
					$upload_dir = wp_upload_dir();
					$file_path = $upload_dir['path'] . '/import.xml';

					// Download the XML file
					$response = wp_remote_get($file_url);
					if (is_wp_error($response)) {
						error_log('Failed to fetch XML file: ' . $response->get_error_message());
						return;
					}
					file_put_contents($file_path, wp_remote_retrieve_body($response));

					// Run Import
					$importer = new WP_Import();
					$importer->fetch_attachments = true;
					$importer->import($file_path);

					error_log('Import process completed successfully.');
				});
